channel.title: New Game Frame?
channel.description: Hey, i've been looking everywhere for runescapes game frame tut but i can't find any. Can someone post a link or tell me how to get like runescape's chat buttons?

item.title: New Game Frame?

item.description:

[quote=“Zillionair1, post:2, topic:249138”][quote author=xray veeo link=topic=328413.msg2569408#msg2569408 date=1228565539]
Hey, i’ve been looking everywhere for runescapes game frame tut but i can’t find any. Can someone post a link or tell me how to get like runescape’s chat buttons?
[/quote] Why don’t you just get a screen capturer and take a screenie of the game frame?[/quote]
Are you kidding me?First of all the buttons wouldn’t work second of all i’d have to delete the Report abuse in texthandler and stuff and third of all it would look stupid and i tried it and it looks wierd.
i want the real way
